A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a waste. Have any of the writers or director ever taken a course on how to make a movie? The whole Finn and Rose story of leaving the fleet was a total waste of time that added ZERO to the movie. This plot wasted half a movie. The only good parts of the film were Luke and Yoda\, Luke's lightsaber duel and the touching scene with Hamill and Fisher together one last time.
